csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout prefix="[" suffix="]" delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="author" prefix="[X]">
                <name/>
	            <label form="short" prefix=" (" suffix=".)"/>
                <substitute>
                    <names variable="editor"/>
                </substitute>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
